General.Name: Odd Burger Corporation
General.Description: Odd Burger Corporation operates as a plant-based food technology company in Canada. It manufactures and distributes plant-based proteins and dairy alternatives through a food service product line that is used at corporate owned and franchised vegan restaurant locations. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in London, Canada.
General.Address: 505 Consortium Court, London, ON, Canada, N6E 2S8
